keel.Algorithms.Associative_Classification.ClassifierCBA

Class Itemset

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Associative_Classification.ClassifierCBA.Itemset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable

    public class Itemset
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable
    This class stores an itemset representation for classification by association algorithms. Also, it stores some useful information to manage the itemset.
    Since:
    JDK1.5
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jesus Alcal√° (University of Granada) 09/02/2010

        Returns:

      • calculateSupports

        public void calculateSupports(myDataset train)
        It computes the support, rule support, hits, misses and PER of our itemset for a given dataset.
        Parameters:
        train - Given training dataset to be able to calculate supports

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(java.lang.Object a)
        Function to compare objects of the Itemset class. Necessary to be able to use "sort" function. It sorts in an decreasing order of attribute. If equals, in an decreasing order of value of the attribute. If equals, in an decreasing order of class.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable
        Parameters:
        a - Itemset object to compare with.
        Returns:
        -1 if a is bigger, 1 if smaller and 0 otherwise.
